title: The Only way out
brief_description: A study of decentralisation - Australia is already one of the most highly urbanised countries in the world, and municipal and State authorities are finding it difficult to provide the facilities necessary for large populations. Examines moves towards large-scale decentralisation in South Australia and Albury/Wodonga.
